rules: Overlines/Labels MUST be uppercase + tracking-widest + text-xs
Line height: leading-none for headers, leading-relaxed for body
Never use pure black (#000000) for backgrounds, use #0A0A0A
Text contrast must meet APCA standards
Interactive elements must have explicit hover states

spacing.rule: Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs. Containers with borders must have internal padding (p-6 or p-8).

editor_split.editor_pane: col-span-12 lg:col-span-8 border-r border-white/10 p-8 overflow-y-auto
editor_split.sidebar_pane: hidden lg:block lg:col-span-4 bg-neutral-900/50 p-6 overflow-y-auto

inputs.style: bg-black/20 border-white/10 focus:border-electric-blue focus:ring-1 focus:ring-electric-blue rounded-md

shadcn: Remove default rounded-xl, use rounded-lg or rounded-md for a sharper look
Darken default muted backgrounds to match Obsidian theme
Increase padding in Cards and Dialogs

visual_enhancers.tracing_beam: Use for active states or high-priority cards
visual_enhancers.gradients: Avoid full-screen gradients. Use subtle radial gradients for spotlights.
visual_enhancers.textures: Add subtle noise texture to the background for depth.

backgrounds.alt: Dark cubes with glowing green lines

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts links to the <head> of index.html immediately.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js to include the custom colors (obsidian, electric-blue, etc.) and font families.
3. GLOBAL CSS: Update index.css to set the base background to #0A0A0A and text to #FFFFFF.
4. COMPONENT AUDIT: When using Shadcn components, strip the 'default' look. Add 'border-white/10' and 'bg-neutral-900/50' to cards.
5. LAYOUT: Implement the 'Bento' grid for the Dashboard. It must not look like a standard table.
6. EDITOR: The Content Editor is the core. Make it distraction-free but 'tactical'. Use a split pane.
7. MOBILE: Ensure the 'Mobile Preview' component actually looks like a phone screen (use a border-radius and aspect ratio).
8. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to ALL interactive elements (buttons, inputs, toggles).
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI slop' - no generic centered layouts.
Dark colors must be rich, not muddy.
NO AI EMOJIS (robot, brain, rocket) in the UI.
